message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $11,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to go up to $9,500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $10,500.  I believe this product would truly benefit you and it's a fair price for its value.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000, which is a fair price considering the product's value and my needs.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
